EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to GM when PO approves Progress Report
EmailTemplate.name: Progress Report PO Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Progress Report #{!ProgressReports__c.Name} has been approved for Grant # {!ProgressReports__c.Grant__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Progress Report {!01If40000004fzY.Name} has been approved for Grant # {!ProgressReports__c.Grant__c}
This email is to notify you that the Program Approver has approved the Progress Report {!01If40000004fzY.Name} and is ready for your review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
